review: The Fire TV Stick works perfectly for watching Netflix shows and movies.  We do not have a newer TV.  I hooked this device up to a second HDMI port.  I am not overly technically adept.  I managed to get this going relatively easily with no calls to support.  It has been a good purchase for me. I highly recommend.
